name: Iwxxmconverter
tagline: Convert IWXXM wheather format to TAC format
body:
# IWXXMConverter

This Tool can help you to convert IWXXM weather file format to TAC (METAR, TAF, SIGMET, SPECI) ones.
for more information visit these sites:
* [IWXXM File Format]( https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IWXXM)
* [METAR](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/METAR)
* [Metart And TAF decode](http://sto.iki.fi/metar/)
               
Setup Project:

    1) First run these to batch scripts for creation of realted maven artifacts.
        creare-avxml-maven-artifact.bat
        creare-jweather-maven-artifact.bat
    2) Run WXXMConversionApplication main method.
    3) Enjoy Project!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
